allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "& { Set-Location ''E:\\D2Q9_PeriodicHill''; if \(Test-Path ''scripts\\.sync.pid''\) { Get-Content ''scripts\\.sync.pid'' } else { Write-Output ''No PID file found'' } }")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process powershell | Where-Object { $_CommandLine -like ''*auto-sync-worker*'' } | Select-Object -First 1 -Property Id, ProcessName | Format-List")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "g++ -std=c++17 -O3 -Wall -o hill.exe main.cpp -lm; if \($? { Write-Host ''Compilation successful!'' -ForegroundColor Green; ls hill.exe } else { Write-Host ''Compilation failed!'' -ForegroundColor Red }")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Start-Process -FilePath ''.\\hill.exe'' -NoNewWindow -Wait -RedirectStandardOutput ''output.txt'' -RedirectStandardError ''error.txt'' & timeout /t 2 & Stop-Process -Name ''hill'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-Content ''output.txt'' -TotalCount 50; Remove-Item ''output.txt'',''error.txt'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue")
